data.message: What's the point in having a support inbox if I've never once got a reply?

replies.message: Hey Jaydee. This is a great place to ask a question. How can we help you? -Jordan
I sent you a message.. did you receive it?

Facebook 

I hope that you will see this post and help me out, I am already desperate for trying to find solution.
I am soon to be Admin of a business page for well know international company. Me and my team are facing an issue with fake accounts under our client company name ( more than 100 profiles and pages). My client told me that customers often get confused and they get directed to the wrong FB page instead of the genuine account(Some of these pages don't seem to be having an admin anymore) and they want me to shut down all those accounts that are using company name, logo and content. 
Is there a way that Facebook could either combine these pages or completely shut them down. 
I tried with reports, but there are so many accounts I just cant do it manually. Could you give me e-mail adress of Facebook employee who could solve those issues.
Thank you in advance. 
Best regards
Facebook , Why is it my post are invisible
I've asked Facebook plenty of questions plenty of times. I never get a straight answer from them.
I've lost admin to a page.. where I was the only admin.. can you help with it? Is the message function just for show.. or do messages actually get received in this mofo?? FFS FFFS..
You've added the page back to my list.. but still no admin.. is FB testing things out.. or is this intentional? How is it possible to be half an admin?

Still nothing in terms of full admin recovery.. I know something is going on because my page popped back without the admin privilege.. of course these are just my own theories because support inbox is not really a support inbox in this mofo..
Still nothing.. when am I gonna get my admin back for my page??
